il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser

Class EnvironmentSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.EnvironmentSettings

  • public class EnvironmentSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Settings that their value either is not directly read by the parser, or depends on absolute file paths; and thus shouldn't be at ExperimentSettings.
